content: q port group grpglbl Group: GRPGLBL.0 Inactive LACP Mode: Active Shared VSWITCH <none> ifIndex: 2112 Load Balancing: Collaborative Interval: 300 RDEV: 1930.P00 Adapter ID: 3907000BB4B7.010C RDEV: 1910.P00 Adapter ID: 3907000BB4B7.0174 Ready; define vswitch vswglbl ethernet group grpglbl global VSWITCH SYSTEM VSWGLBL is created Ready; HCPSWU2830I VSWITCH SYSTEM VSWGLBL status is ready. HCPSWU2830I DTCVSW3 is VSWITCH controller for device 1930.P00. HCPSWU2855I Device 1930.P00 for VSWITCH VSWGLBL is enabled for port group GRPGLB L by LACP. HCPSWU2830I DTCVSW4 is VSWITCH controller for device 1910.P00. HCPSWU2855I Device 1910.P00 for VSWITCH VSWGLBL is enabled for port group GRPGLB L by LACP. As we saw with the first system, the VSwitch is defined and becomes active after a short period. We issued Q VSWITCH DETAILS on RDBKZVMF. The results are shown in Example 14-12. Example 14-12 QUERY VSWITCH DETAILS for the Global VSwitch on the second system q vswitch vswglbl details VSWITCH
